title: single_meal_system_builder_food_record
summary: Single-meal food record: rice with stir-fried cucumber and pork sausage (moo yor), documenting constrained daily living while building the farm data system.
description: This record documents a simple meal consumed as the only meal of the day by P'To (system builder) at MaMeeFarm. The meal consists of rice with stir-fried cucumber and pork sausage (moo yor). This data unit captures real livelihood constraints and daily subsistence context behind continuous DGCP system-building work.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
